about_the_game:
Welcome to Train Planet Demo, the ultimate locomotion simulation game that allows you to immerse yourself in the captivating world of trains! Get ready to experience the thrill of being a train operator as you embark on a journey across a vast and diverse virtual landscape.

Originally this game was created with love as an amateur project by a few enthusiasts, train fans, and real train drivers who wanted to translate their experience and impressions of real railroading into a simulator and bring these emotions home to their computers. The game where detailed locomotives and railroad operations, real locations and stations, real track profiles and recognizable landscapes that allow you to test and improve your train driving skills.
Now, after a long development period, we want to continue to develop and improve it together with the wishes of the community.

In Train Planet, you have the opportunity to explore an incredibly detailed and realistic environment, meticulously crafted to replicate the charm and complexity of real-world train systems. Whether you're a seasoned train enthusiast or a curious newcomer, this game offers an engaging and educational experience that will leave you captivated.

Choose from a wide range of iconic locomotives from different vendors, each faithfully recreated with meticulous attention to detail. From diesel engines to high-speed electric trains, the choice is yours. Take control of the locomotive and feel the raw power as you navigate through challenging terrain, over expansive bridges, and into bustling urban areas.

As you progress through the game, you'll encounter a variety of scenarios and challenges that will put your skills to the test. Master the art of train operation by managing realistic controls, adjusting speeds, monitoring signals, and ensuring a smooth ride for your passengers or cargo. Take on different roles, such as a passenger train conductor, a freight train operator, or even a historic locomotive restorer.

Immerse yourself in stunning visuals and dynamic weather conditions that evolve as you travel across the diverse regions of Train Planet. From scenic countryside routes to bustling cityscapes, each location offers a unique and immersive experience, bringing the world of trains to life like never before.

Train Planet is not just a game; it's an authentic train simulation experience that combines realism, entertainment, and education. So, hop aboard and embark on an unforgettable journey through the world of trains in Train Planet!
